EDM.thankContent: Thank you for using sen-ryo takeaway online ordering service.  Please refer to the attached online ordering receipt (
EDM.thankContent02: ) for order pick-up. We hope to serve you again soon!
EDM.showStaff: Please present this pick-up QR code to our staffs
EDM.name: Contact Name
EDM.congratzContent: You have reached the spending threshold to become a sen-ryo member. Simply sign up to enjoy below exclusive privileges!
EDM.congratzContent02: For more details, please refer to
EDM.mayReg: Or you may sign up using your designated registration link:
EDM.HKaddress01: 18/F, Maxim's Centre, No. 17 Cheung Shun Street, Cheung Sha Wan, Kowloon, Hong Kong
EDM.memberTandC: Terms and Conditions of sen-ryo Membership Program
EDM.T&CContent01: 1.If the order is not being picked up within 1 hour from the selected pickup time specified on the order, the order will be deemed forfeited and no refund will be made.
EDM.T&CContent02: 2.You must pick up your order at the store stated on the order.
EDM.T&CContent03: 3.During pickup, you must show the valid order QR code on the order’s printed version to the store’s staff for verification. Each order number and its order QR code can be used for pickup once only. Pickup records held by Genki Sushi shall be treated as the conclusive evidence without any dispute.
EDM.T&CContent04: 4.It is your duty to keep the order copies and its QR codes at a secured place. Anyone who picks up the orders with a valid pickup order and QR code will be deemed your authorized representative.
EDM.T&CContent05: 5.All items sold are non-refundable, non-returnable and non-exchangeable after the completion of order pickup.
EDM.T&CContent06: 6.sen-ryo shall make every effort to ensure item(s) displayed on the website are in stock. If from time to time item(s) become out of stock, Genki Sushi reserves the right to offer alternative item(s) of similar value and style subject to the consent of the customer.
EDM.T&CContent07: 7.We have sent a copy of this receipt to the email address you provided during order. You may also print this order out or save it as an image on your mobile phone for order pickup.
EDM.T&CContent08: 8.Used sen-ryo Points will be deducted from the member account instantly at the transaction. sen-ryo Points will be granted to the member account within 24 hours after the transaction.
EDM.reminded: This is an automated message. Please do not reply directly to this email.

maintenancePage.content: Sorry, we are undergoing scheduled system upgrade and maintenance. We will be back in a bit. Please check back later. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
maintenancePage.content1: Sorry, we are down for scheduled system upgrade and maintenance but will be back in no time! Please check back later. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

registrationStep1.popupWarning: Please sign up with a valid +852/+853/+86 mobile number. This mobile number will be your login credentials after signing up.

registrationStep2.knowAboutYouP2: We cordially invite you to become a sen-ryo Member!This dedicated registration link will expire in 7 days upon the issue date. It can only be used for one-time registration. Information provided cannot be edited after submission. Upon successful registration and email verification, eligible membership will be effective within 24 hours, the membership welcome email and offer will be issued accordingly.

transactionPickTerms.title: Pickup Terms & Conditions
transactionPickTerms.remarks1: If the order is not being picked up within 1 hour from the selected pickup time specified on the order, the order will be deemed forfeited and no refund will be made.
transactionPickTerms.remarks2: You must pick up your order at the store stated on the order.
transactionPickTerms.remarks3: During pickup, you must show the valid order QR code on the order’s printed version to the store’s staff for verification. Each order number and its order QR code can be used for pickup once only. Pickup records held by Genki Sushi shall be treated as the conclusive evidence without any dispute.
transactionPickTerms.remarks4: It is your duty to keep the order copies and its QR codes at a secured place. Anyone who picks up the orders with a valid pickup order and QR code will be deemed your authorized representative.
transactionPickTerms.remarks5: All items sold are non-refundable, non-returnable and non-exchangeable after the completion of order pickup.
transactionPickTerms.remarks6: sen-ryo shall make every effort to ensure item(s) displayed on the website are in stock. If from time to time item(s) become out of stock, Genki Sushi reserves the right to offer alternative item(s) of similar value and style subject to the consent of the customer.
transactionPickTerms.remarks7: We have sent a copy of this receipt to the email address you provided during order. You may also print this order out or save it as an image on your mobile phone for order pickup.
transactionPickTerms.remarks8: Used sen-ryo Points will be deducted from the member account instantly at the transaction. sen-ryo Points will be granted to the member account within 24 hours after the transaction.

about.careerCardContent1: Looking to get ahead in your career?
about.careerCardContent2: We sincerely invite you to join our team.
about.coverMarriage: (covering Marriage, Maternity, Paternity, Birthday, Compassionate, Grandchlidren Birth)
about.interestedInJoining: If you are interested in joining the sen-ryo family, you may do one of the following:
about.description1: Visit sen-ryo stores for an interview during 3pm-6pm Mon to Fri
about.description2: Fax your resume to 2216 7874 to request an interview
about.description3: Email your resume to recruit@sen-ryo.com.hk to request an interview
about.description5: Personal data collected will be used for recruitment purposes only.
about.content: With the tradition and artisan of Edomae sushi, sen-ryo sets its foundation of nigiri sushi. Seizing the original taste of the ingredients, as well as exploring the full potential of the materials is always the heart of shokunin spirit.

aboutUsRecruitment.shopManagerRequirment2: At least 8-year experience in supervisory capacity especially in F&B industry
aboutUsRecruitment.shopManagerRequirment3: Lead the team to achieve business objectives
aboutUsRecruitment.shopManagerRequirment4: Ensure operation efficiency and provide extraordinary service to the customers
aboutUsRecruitment.shopManagerRequirment5: Strong leadership skills, excellent interpersonal and communication abilities
aboutUsRecruitment.shopManagerRequirment7: Candidates with less experience will be considered as Assistant Manager
aboutUsRecruitment.kitchenSupervisorRequirment1: At least 2-year experience in supervisory capacity especially in F&B industry
aboutUsRecruitment.kitchenSupervisorRequirment4: Floor supervisors must possess excellent customer service skills
aboutUsRecruitment.kitchenSupervisorRequirment5: Approachable, courteous and good team spirit
aboutUsRecruitment.serverRequirment1: Responsible for welcoming and serving customers, introducing menu items
aboutUsRecruitment.serverRequirment2: Understanding customer needs and providing a pleasant dining experience
aboutUsRecruitment.serverRequirment3: Assist with table setting and clearing, maintaining restaurant cleanliness and hygiene
aboutUsRecruitment.serverRequirment4: Excellent communication and customer service skills
aboutUsRecruitment.serverRequirment5: Approachable, courteous and good team spirit
aboutUsRecruitment.serverRequirment6: Candidate with relevant experience in F&B industry is preferred
aboutUsRecruitment.cookrRequirment1: Responsible for sushi, sashimi, food ingredient preparation and cooking
aboutUsRecruitment.cookrRequirment2: Responsible for kitchen-related tasks, ensuring food preparation processes and equipment meet hygiene standards as required by the company
aboutUsRecruitment.cookrRequirment3: Good communication skills, courteous and good team spirit
aboutUsRecruitment.cookrRequirment4: Candidates with relevant experience in Japanese cuisine is highly preferred
aboutUsRecruitment.cleanerRequirment1: Responsible for cleaning stoves, utensils and kitchenware
aboutUsRecruitment.cleanerRequirment2: Maintain kitchen cleanliness and meet hygiene standards

benefitCard.dayOffAmountAndLeaves1: 78 days of Rest Day per year
benefitCard.dayOffAmountAndLeaves2: 12-14 days of Annual Leave per year
benefitCard.dayOffAmountAndLeaves3: 3 days of Statutory Holidays per year
benefitCard.dayOffAmountAndLeaves4: Staff Full-Paid Leave (including Marriage Leave, Maternity Leave, Paternity Leave, Birthday Leave, Grandparents Leave and Compassionate Leave)
benefitCard.bonusContent3: Over Time Allowance (Supervisor grade and below)
benefitCard.bonusContent4: District Allowance $1,000 (Hong Kong Island / Tseung Kwan O / Tung Chung)

ingredient.title: Ingredients
ingredient.titleContent: Ingredient is always the core of Japanese cuisine, especially when it comes to sushi. Direct imported seafood, vinegar and soya sauce from century-old brands, and even the rice used in sushi, every ingredient is carefully selected. Serving the taste of freshness from all over the world is always the vision of sen-ryo.
ingredient.firstP: sen-ryo has partnered with Tsukiji Market for years and experienced the historical relocation. The best seasonal catches are delivered directly from Toyosu to sen-ryo restaurants to offer diners fresh premium seafood.
ingredient.secondP: sen-ryo uses Tome rice, a next generation of Aomori Koshihikari rice variety. Planted using environmental friendly methods and of high nutritional value and food safety standard. Full and rich in luster with moderate viscosity and soft texture, it tastes sweeter than normal rice.
